Reviews.Title: “One of my best hotel stays EVER.”
Reviews.Author: Estrella2009
Reviews.Content: stayed farmers daughter 3 nights 2009 thinking perfect stay found comfortable stylish earth meaning wasnt fancy means wellappointed quality lovely little touches bee bath products nice linens etc meeting 2 friends staying arrived hung tart hotels restaurant waited couple glasses wine yummy chicken strips able easily walk grove book signing town location couldnt farmers market grove probably favorite hotel tart patio sit eat drink leisure sunny ate inside entire time tart breakfast laptop sit sun drink coffee projects staff tart extremely friendly hospitable left told friends wished move farmers daughter live apartment serious love hoping stay june visit unfortunately looks prices gone bit stretch afford

Reviews.Title: “Boutique hotel ? Hardly, This is a bizarre place, find something else”
Reviews.Author: gotbagswilltravel
Reviews.Content: dreadful outside paint job linoleum yup linoleum floors paper thin walls hotel bizarre mona barney staying door wild oats night amazing bedding linens top notch decor doesnt idea doing quick cheap cosmetic job building somehow marketing job cause customers

Reviews.Title: “Always charming”
Reviews.Author: egerstan
Reviews.Content: third time farmers daughter cant beat location charm comfort reasonable price city staff especially helpful adjusting reservations twice due weather issues comfortable convenient farmers marketgrove breakfast meals quick errands

Reviews.Title: “Very Cool Hotel in a great LA location”
Reviews.Author: mirniconata
Reviews.Content: time la performance molly fairfax accidentally found hotel getting dinner tart nearby restaurant time la stayed nights enjoyed stay location street farmers market grove perfect drive stay restaurant tart breakfast dinner lunch farmers market food choices internet free decorated nicely boring bed super comfortable definitely return mireya la jolla ca

Reviews.Title: “Overpriced and Over-Hyped”
Reviews.Author: zockso
Reviews.Content: husband son stayed nights chose hotel based friends recommendation attached restaurant tart close location farmers market grove shopping center left feeling stunned glowing reviews read motel trip farm theme basic motel floor overlooking parking lot couple quirky paintings farm animals walls special touches decor service nice restaurant downstairs service dont information access staff special didnt bother stay checked charge 4 hour wifi ridiculous stay location overpriced basic motel
